p:
Single-crystals of Sr[Li 2Al 2O 2N 2]:Eu 2+ were synthesized starting from Sr 3Al 2O 6 (97.34 mg, 0.2358 mmol, synthesized according to the method of Garcés et al.
54 .) and LiN 3 (23.09 mg, 0.4716 mmol, synthesized according to the method of Fair et al.
55 ) as starting materials, as well as Eu 2O 3 (0.83 mg, 0.0024 mmol, Smart Elements, 99.99%) as doping agent, resulting in a formal europium content of 0.7%. An excess of elemental lithium (16.37 mg, 2.358 mmol, Sigma Aldrich, 99%) was added to act as a fluxing agent.
